name: Department Of Government Efficiency
description: The Department Of Government Efficiency (D.O.G.E) is a decentralized blockchain initiative built on the Base network. Its purpose is to leverage cryptocurrency and blockchain technology to promote awareness of government inefficiency, waste, and mismanagement. The project provides a satirical yet engaging platform for users to participate in the conversation around fiscal accountability and transparency through token-based interactions and decentralized finance (DeFi) utilities.
